5.2.2.1.2. eqcorrscan.utils.catalog_to_dd.read_phase¶

eqcorrscan.utils.catalog_to_dd.read_phase(ph_file)[source]¶

Read hypoDD phase files into Obspy catalog class.

Parameters

ph_file (str) – Phase file to read event info from.

Returns

Catalog of events from file.

Return type

obspy.core.event.Catalog

>>> from obspy.core.event.catalog import Catalog
>>> # Get the path to the test data
>>> import eqcorrscan
>>> import os
>>> TEST_PATH = os.path.dirname(eqcorrscan.__file__) + '/tests/test_data'
>>> catalog = read_phase(TEST_PATH + '/tunnel.phase')
>>> isinstance(catalog, Catalog)
True
